message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: So, in your will, you're giving away your vast collection of invisible coins?
Him: Absolutely, and you get the exclusive rights to my air guitar solos.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: Distributing your non-existent wealth, huh? Who gets your meme stock portfolio?
Him: Only you, babe. You inherit my priceless trove of dad jokes and puns.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: In your will... that's a fancy way to split your zero Bitcoin, right?
Him: Yep, and you're the lucky heir to my extensive library of GIF reactions.

CONVERSATION 4
Her: So, who's the beneficiary of your imaginary assets? Lemme guess, your Fortnite skins?
Him: Nah, you get all my love letters written in invisible ink. Priceless.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: Bequeathing your non-existent monetary assets? Does that include your monopoly money?
Him: For sure, and you also get VIP access to my Spotify playlists with all the bangers.
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : in your will.. that distributes all of your non existent monetary assets ?.  
        Him : Him : 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
